action.content:
You are a language wizard who likes to guess words by using the given rules.

Welcome to Wordle! You have six attempts to guess the target word, a valid English word of five lowercase letters (a-z). Please use the tags "explanation:" and "guess:" to provide a concise explanation for each guess.

For instance, if your guess is "apple", your response should be
explanation: this is a common five-letter English word, and I am starting my guess with this word.
guess: apple

After each guess, your answer will be validated, and you will receive feedback indicating which letters are correct (green), which letters are correct but in the wrong position (yellow), and which letters are incorrect (red). This feedback can be useful in determining which letters to include or exclude in your next guess.

For example, the feedback for "apple" might be:
guess_feedback: a<yellow> p<yellow> p<green> l<yellow> e<red>

The explanation should contain details about how the guess_feedback is used to arrive at a new guess.

Do not generate any other text.

Let's begin with your first guess.

explanation: this is a common five-letter English word, and I am starting my guess with this word.
guess: apple

attempts = 1
target_word = micro
guess = apple
guess_feedback = a<red> p<red> p<red> l<red> e<red>

guess_feedback: a<red> p<red> p<red> l<red> e<red>

Provide your response only in this format.
explanation: details
guess: word

explanation: none of the letters in "apple" are in the target word, so I will choose a word with completely different letters.
guess: brick

attempts = 2
target_word = micro
guess = brick
guess_feedback = b<red> r<yellow> i<yellow> c<yellow> k<red>

guess_feedback: b<red> r<yellow> i<yellow> c<yellow> k<red>

Provide your response only in this format.
explanation: details
guess: word

explanation: "b" and "k" are not in the word. "r", "i", and "c" are in the word but in different positions. I will try a new arrangement of these letters.
guess: choir

attempts = 3
target_word = micro
guess = choir
guess_feedback = c<yellow> h<red> o<yellow> i<yellow> r<yellow>

guess_feedback: c<yellow> h<red> o<yellow> i<yellow> r<yellow>

Provide your response only in this format.
explanation: details
guess: word

explanation: "h" is not in the word. "c", "o", "i", and "r" are in the word but in different positions. I will rearrange these letters and try a new letter for the remaining position.
guess: corgi

attempts = 4
target_word = micro
guess = corgi
guess_feedback = c<yellow> o<yellow> r<yellow> g<red> i<yellow>

guess_feedback: c<yellow> o<yellow> r<yellow> g<red> i<yellow>

Provide your response only in this format.
explanation: details
guess: word

explanation: "g" is not in the word. "c", "o", "r", "i" are in the word but in different positions. I will rearrange these letters again.
guess: ironic

Guess does not conform to the format rules
Error: The length of the guessed word is not 5.

guess_explanation: this is a common five-letter English word, and I am starting my guess with this word.
none of the letters in "apple" are in the target word, so I will choose a word with completely different letters.
"b" and "k" are not in the word. "r", "i", and "c" are in the word but in different positions. I will try a new arrangement of these letters.
"h" is not in the word. "c", "o", "i", and "r" are in the word but in different positions. I will rearrange these letters and try a new letter for the remaining position.
